LanguageData.RimTalk_MidnightSnackSuccess_Child.label: sneaky snack success
LanguageData.RimTalk_MidnightSnackSuccess_Child.descr: Hehe, we got away with it! Sweets with friends in the middle of the night is the best!
LanguageData.RimTalk_MidnightSnackSuccess_Baby.label: sneaky snack success
LanguageData.RimTalk_MidnightSnackSuccess_Toddler.des: gaga!gu?... (translation: Yummy treats with my friends! This is our little secret!)
